title: US National Security Adviser Michael Flynn resigns over allegations of links with Russia | The Indian Express

organizations.name: indian express online media pvt ltd

text:
US National Security Adviser Michael Flynn resigns over allegations of links with Russia US National Security Adviser Michael Flynn resigns over allegations of links with Russia US National Security Adviser Michael Flynn resigns over allegations that he has contacts with Russia. By: Express Web Desk | New Delhi | Updated: February 14, 2017 9:49 am 
US National Security Adviser Michael Flynn today resigned over allegations that he has contacts with Russia. In his resignation letter, Flynn said that in the fast pace of events he inadvertently briefed vice president Pence with incomplete information about Russian contacts. 
On Monday, a top White House adviser had said that Flynn enjoyed the “full confidence” of President Donald Trump. © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
